> {{@@[[include :scpko:theme:space]]@@}}

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Noto+Sans+KR');

}

:root {
    --header-title: "SCP 재단";
    --header-subtitle: "별, 혜성, 행성";
    --sp_header-subtitle-scale: 1.5;

    --header-font: "Urbanist", Nanum Gothic, sans-serif;
    --body-font: "DM Sans", 'NanumSquareRound', sans-serif;
    --mono-font: 'Martian Mono', 'Noto Sans KR', monospace;
}

#header h2 span {
    line-height: 1.25;
}

#side-bar .side-block.red {
    background-color: rgb(var(--space-sun) / 0.5);
}
#side-bar .side-block.green {
    background-color: rgb(var(--space-planet) / 0.175);
}
